<<<<<<< HEAD
By the King. A proclamation prohibiting the importation of allome and the buying, or spending thereof in any of His Maiesties dominions. Proclamations. 1618-03-16 England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I) James I, King of England, 1566-1625.
[3] sheets
By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, deputies and assignes of Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie, [Imprinted at London : Anno M.DC.XVII. [1617, i.e. 1618]]
Caption title. Dated at end: Westminster the sixteenth of March, in the fifteenth yeere of our reigne .. Imprint from colophon. The year date is given according to Lady Day dating. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

[3] sheets

Caption title. Dated at end: Westminster the sixteenth of March, in the fifteenth yeere of our reigne .. Imprint from colophon. The year date is given according to Lady Day dating. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
